summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department accepting electrical underground and surface rights distribution easements over portions of Lot 18, Denny-Blaine-Lake Park Addition; Section 6, Township 26 North, Range 4 East; Section 2, Township 26 North, Range 3 East; Lot 1, Block 2,Rose Addition No. 2; Section 21, Township 26 North, Range 4 East; Tract 19, Maywood Acre Tracts; Section 18, Township 26 North, Range 4 East; Section 24, Township 26 North, Range 3 East; Section 24, Township 26 North, Range 3 East; Lot 28, Elford Park; Lot 2, Block 3, H. B. Duncanson's Seola View Tracts; Parcel A, City of Seattle Short Subdivision No. 9205092; Lot 2, King County Short Plat No. 1281044; and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
